pages.text: A crone so powerful that the sky darkens when she's nearby. She knows many secrets and will use them at her advantage. She knows very well how to fight, and attacking her with a mundane melee weapon may hurt more the attacker than  Baba Yaga. $(l:constructs/weapons/spear_of_the_hunter)Spear of the Hunter$(/l) is an effective weapon against the Crone, as it avoids the hit-back.

pages.title: Fighting Baba Yaga
pages.text: Summoning animals, throwing $(l:brewing/brewing#brew_definition)Brews$(/l) and $(item)Splash Potions$() of Slowness, Instant Damage or Poison, are just a few of the weapons in her arsenal. She may also spawn $(l:creatures/owl)Owls$(/l) and $(item)Cave Spiders$() or throw a $(item)Jump Boost$() splash potion.

pages.title: Baba Yaga's Gaze
pages.text: Baba Yaga not always has bad intentions. The future $(item)Fortune Teller$() may be predicted to a good fate, and Baba Yaga encounter might not have a negative connotation.
